FuncDef:
The set board-type command configures a service type for a service board, only VSUI-160-E boards are supported.
By default, a VSUI-160-E works in CGN service mode.

ParaDef.Info:
Configures a service board to work in CGN service mode.
-

Specifies the slot ID of a service board.
-

Examples: Warning: The current QOE function will be invalid and the board will be reset after the board type changed,continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: Configures a service board to work in CGN service mode.
